field.label: TCP port number service listens on:
field.help: TCP port number for Tang to listen on. Defaults to 8888.

field.label: Listen Address:
field.help: Address to listen on. Default is to listen on all interfaces. If you need specific multiple interfaces, listen on localhost and use a port redirect in the firewall to redirect the interfaces you need to localhost. IPv6 localhost (::1) will listen on both IPv6 and IPv4.

field.label: JWK Directory:
field.help: Directory in which to store key files. Defaults to /var/db/tang

field.label: Logfile Locations:
field.help: Where to write logs. Do not change unless you know what you're doing. Defaults to /var/log/tang

field.label: Executable Location:
field.help: Where to find the tang executable. Don not change unless you know what you're doing. Defaults to /usr/local/libexec/tangd
